title: Replace logo with user-provided Archak image

requirements.summary: Replace existing generated logo in Navigation bar and Footer with user-provided 'ARCHAK' logo image
acceptanceCriteria: The new 'ARCHAK' logo (green bubble-text wordmark on white background) is displayed in the navigation bar in place of the old generated logo.
The same new logo is displayed in the footer wherever the logo was previously shown.
The logo image file is stored at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png.
No broken image references remain for the old logo.

file_operations.description: Save the user-provided 'ARCHAK' logo (green bubble-text wordmark on white/transparent background) as a static asset at this exact file path. This image will replace the existing generated logo throughout the application.

Update the src attribute to point to the new logo file at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png (reference as /assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png in the src). Remove any references to the old generated logo file. Ensure the logo displays correctly in both desktop and mobile navigation views.

Update the src attribute to point to the new logo file at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png (reference as /assets/generated/logo.dim_300x120.png in the src). Remove any references to the old generated logo file. Ensure the logo displays correctly alongside the tagline and other footer content.
